file.name: job-scopeId-jobId-steps-_count.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.2

info:
  title: Eclipse Kapua REST API - Jobs Steps
  version: '1.0'
  contact:
    name: Eclipse Kapua Dev Team
    url: https://eclipse.org/kapua
    email: kapua-dev@eclipse.org
  license:
    name: Eclipse Public License 2.0
    url: https://www.eclipse.org/legal/epl-2.0

paths:
  /{scopeId}/jobs/{jobId}/steps/_count:
    post:
      tags:
        - Job - Step
      summary: Count the Jobs Steps
      operationId: jobStepCount
      parameters:
        - $ref: '../openapi.yaml#/components/parameters/scopeId'
        - $ref: '../job/job.yaml#/components/parameters/jobId'
      requestBody:
        $ref: '../openapi.yaml#/components/requestBodies/kapuaQuery'
      responses:
        200:
          $ref: '../openapi.yaml#/components/responses/countResult'
        401:
          $ref: '../openapi.yaml#/components/responses/unauthenticated'
        403:
          $ref: '../openapi.yaml#/components/responses/subjectUnauthorized'
        500:
          $ref: '../openapi.yaml#/components/responses/kapuaError'

Error: parse: parse spec: paths: /{scopeId}/jobs/{jobId}/steps/_count: post: operation "jobStepCount": parameters: parse parameter "": resolve "../openapi.yaml#/components/parameters/scopeId" reference: invalid parameter reference: "../openapi.yaml#/components/parameters/scopeId"
